name: You Are Lost (FoundingAlex)
description:
Wander through an empty wasteland on an unknown quest. Gather weapons to help fight against something that wishes to hinder your progress. Memorize where resources are for later use. Fight through groups of various enemies in pursuit of your goal.

Includes:

- 3 individual weapons

- 4 distinct locations

- 10 different enemies

Resolution: 1600x900
